segments.text: I can't believe what I'm seeing here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a wobbly stool, reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks like he's about to fall any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the stool is going to tip over, and he's going to get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him is waiting for a cookie, completely oblivious to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of urgency, like I need to warn them to be careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is totally unaware of what's happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the boy realizes how dangerous his position is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar seems to be the only thing on his mind right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he manages to get down safely without falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is making me really anxious for their safety.
segments.speaker: PAR
